title: Modifications
context: ยง431:4-407 Modifications. Modification of the terms of the subscribers&rsquo; agreement or of the power of attorney of a domestic reciprocal insurer shall be made jointly by the attorney and the subscribers&rsquo; advisory committee. No modification shall be effective retroactively, nor as to any insurance contract issued prior thereto, nor shall it be effective until approved by the commissioner. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
